summary: This bill, the "She Develops Regulations In Vehicle Equality and Safety Act" (She DRIVES Act), mandates the Secretary of Transportation to update federal motor vehicle safety standards concerning crash testing. It requires the inclusion of 50th percentile male and 5th percentile female test dummies in frontal and side impact testing. The bill outlines timelines for rulemaking, updates the New Car Assessment Program, and mandates reports to Congress on existing and future testing devices and their potential for improvement, including comparison with international standards.
